item.title: Hugo Setup
item.description: Hugo Setup for WT1 #wt1/ #hugo Setting up the site Strategy: copy the example site of the theme adapt it from there. used Quick Start | Hugo as a reference Step 1 - install hugo (already done) Step 2 - Create a new Site copied theme example site: cp -r hugo-theme-learn/exampleSite webbook Step 3 - add a theme forked theme and cloned it (in case we want to adapt something) git clone git@github.
